steps to reproduce:
- create a new project "test.rename" with a source folder "src"
- create new class "A" in default package
- edit A.java: remove "public", change "A" to "Bee", save
- edit A.java: reinsert "public", change "Bee" to "A", bang:

fixed.
for some reason the type did not exist
could not reproduce, but fixed code - also in other refactoring actions.

please verify

Verified (assertion violation is gone).

Java Model Exception is still there, but that seems to be a another problem.
(Asynchronous viewer updates, etc. See also 
http://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=14092 ).
